name: inimitable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very unusual or of very high quality and therefore impossible to copy: your own inimitable style/way He was describing, in his own inimitable style/way, how to write a best-selling novel. She appeared at the Oscars wearing one of Versace's inimitable creations.

impossible to copy because of being of very high quality or a particular style: Louis Armstrong’s inimitable gravelly voice
